ART_ATTENDANCE_IMPOSSIBLE: ART attendance model can only be estimated if ART programme data are used.
NO_COUNTRY_LEVEL_FIT: Cannot fit model at country level. Choose a different level.
MISSING_ART_DATA: ART dataset not provided. ART data cannot be selected Yes to include.
OPTIONS_ANC_DESCRIPTION: Optionally select which quarter of data to use at time point 1 and 2
OPTIONS_ANC_COVERAGE_LABEL: ART coverage prior to first ANC
OPTIONS_ART_DESCRIPTION: Select whether to include ART data or not in model run
OPTIONS_QUARTER1_LABEL: Calendar quarter at midpoint of survey
OPTIONS_ART_NEIGHBOURING_DISTRICT_HELP: Model proportion of ART residents who seek treatment in neighboring districts
OPTIONS_SURVEY_DESCRIPTION: Select which survey to use for each indicator and whether to run the model with survey ART coverage or VLS.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_DESCRIPTION: Options for calibrating to Spectrum outputs. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Some calibrations will invalidate model inference to survey, ART programme, and ANC testing data. If calibration adjustments are large, it is recommended to review Spectrum results and Naomi input data rather than accept large calibration adjustments.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_P: Calibrate to Spectrum population size by sex and 5-year age group by national or subnational. If national Spectrum file, national and subnational will return the same result.
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total PLHIV.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_A: Adjust to Spectrum number on ART
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total on ART
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: Options for controlling downloaded model results
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_MAX_ITERATIONS_HELP: Maximum number of iteration for model run
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_NO_OF_SIMULATIONS_HELP: Number of simulatons for generating uncertainty ranges
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_SIMULATION_SEED_HELP: Random number generator seed for uncertainty sample
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_PERMISSIVE_HELP: Select 'Yes' to allow fits with convergence or data errors
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_MEAN_LABEL: Logit prior mean for neighboring district attraction
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_HELP: Logit offset for odds of obtaining ART in district j compared to home district
AREAS_AREA_LEVEL_HIERARCHY_BOUNDARIES_MI: Either supply levels, hierarchy, and boundaries, or area_merged
AREAS_LEVEL_NOT_UNIQUE:
Area levels not unique.
Duplicated level: {{missing_levels}}
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PREVALENCE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for HIV prevalence observations.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_ART_COVERAGE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for ART coverage.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PROPORTION_RECENT_: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for proportion recently infected amongst HIV positive
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_PROJECTION_QUARTER_HELP: Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection. Must be after calendar quarter to generate estimates.
INDICATOR_LABEL_PREVALENCE: Proportion of total population HIV positive
INDICATOR_LABEL_PLHIV: Number of people living with HIV
INDICATOR_LABEL_INFECTIONS: Number of new infections per year
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ART_COVERAGE: ART coverage among ANC attendees prior to first ANC
